channel.title: rip on Ross A. Baker
channel.description: Recent content in rip on Ross A. Baker

item.description: In Extreme Programming, we picked a new pair programmer every day. I decided that was nonsense, and adopted Pete. We paired for the next nineteen years. He preferred the title "alpha" to "principal staff," but he shared his opinions whether you wanted them or not. He logged off this morning. Rest easy, friend. P.S., this is what he thought of YAML. #TuxedoCat #RIP
